data.title: EN: 07 April 1893 — José de Almada Negreiros’s Anniversary
data.meta_description: Almada Negreiros was a renowned and versatile artist of XX Century Portuguese Modernism (cultural, artistic, and literary movement). Being self-taught, as he did not attend any art school, he gained…
data.text:
“ENOUGH BANG ENOUGH!

A GENERATION THAT CONSENTS TO BE REPRESENTED

BY A DANTAS IS A GENERATION THAT NEVER WAS!

IT’S A BUNCH OF INDIGENTS, UNWORTHY, AND BLIND!

IT’S A PACK OF CHARLATANS AND SELLOUTS,

AND CAN ONLY GIVE BIRTH BELOW ZERO!

DOWN WITH THE GENERATION! DOWN WITH DANTAS, DOWN! BOOM!”

[…]

“DANTAS WAS BORN TO PROVE THAT

NOT EVERYONE WHO WRITES KNOWS HOW TO WRITE!

(…)

DANTAS NAKED IS HIDEOUS!

DANTAS STINKS FROM THE MOUTH!”
